pageInfoSection.heading: WEB DEVELOPMENT FOR YOU
pageInfoSection.description:
Do you really have the time to research, download, and learn how to use these applications to create your own website? Will it load quickly, will it be found easily during searches?

We've developed many websites ranging from sites for small, local businesses, to medium-sized regional companies, to large multi-national businesses. The list includes for-profit companies and non-profit organizations and schools.

Websites are the digital homes for businesses and organizations. Let Todd Productions work with you and your staff to build a site that tells your story while making it optimized for visitors to access.
pageInfoSection.seoDescription: Design a personalized website for you and your business and be fully search engine optimized with a fast running website in Maumee Ohio

samples.title: Sea School
samples.description:
Sea School marketing website is a user registration based website that was built to increase student sign ups. This SEO optimized website integrates with a custom backend web application and third-party CRM.

After optimizing pages and content, Sea School was able to double their user traffic and conversion rate by providing a simple user experience.

samples.title: Elizabeth Scott Community
samples.description:
Elizabeth Scott Community marketing website was designed to equally attract new residents and employees to their facility. This website was refined from a technical SEO perspective with Google Lighthouse.

The user experience on this website was supposed to be simple and quick. Providing users, whether looking for residency or employment, the opportunity to call to action pages quickly.

samples.title: HealthSource Chiropractic
samples.description:
HealthSource Chiropractic's website houses over 130 clinics apart from their national franchise. This website was redesigned to improve loading times and SEO rankings. The site was developed in a way to allow quick changes to happen for any marketing needs.

With this fast-paced franchise company there are quick design changes, specialized promotions and landing pages that need to be set up in a relatively short time period due to the Headless CMS and dynamic code.

samples.title: APCA Drug Consortium
samples.description:
APCA Drug Consortium is a user subscription based web application that works hand in hand with its front-facing marketing side. This website integrates with multiple custom REST and SOAP APIs to allow users a great user experience.

This website continues to drive new subscription sign-ups and renewals. Allowing users to manage their own account and billing information.

samples.title: B² Tech Solutions
samples.description: B² Technical Solutions is a smaller remote company that uses their website mainly as a portfolio of work experience. This modernly designed website allows users to see how B2 provides a variety of IT related solutions specializing in IAM services.

samples.title: CP Specialty Products
samples.description: CP Specialty Products expanded their website to show their catalog of machined parts for paint applications. The catalog of products allows users to see different categories, part information and photos to help determine the best fit for their paint needs.

samples.title: Maumee Summer Fair
samples.description: Maumee Summer Fair is an annual event that happens in the greater Northwest Ohio area. This website is an informational guide on the upcoming activities, music performances, craft and food vendors that can be expected for the year. The brightly animated website reflects the fun experience of the summer time event.

samples.title: Siferds Plumbing, Heating, & Air Conditioning
samples.description: Siferds Plumbing, Heating & Air Conditioning marketing website is used to help provide information for those in need of plumbing and HVAC services in the local Findlay, Ohio area. The SEO optimization along with it's outstanding Google Business listing drive new leads and conversions by means of their contact form.
